description: A hoofed mammal with a short coat, long mane, and a long tail. Domesticated since times immemorial.
A dog, or a wolf. Either a friend to man or a fearsome enemy, but never in between.
A soft and furry animal often served by humans.
An enormous, lumbering animal with a prodigious trunk. Its majesty is best appreciated from a respectful distance.
A creatures with the tail of a snake and the body of a human, usually a woman.
A hoofed mammal with a short coat, long mane, and a long tail. Domesticated since times immemorial.
